mapper.select: SELECT bno,btag,bgenre,cover,btitle,writer,price,sale_price,dis_rate,publisher,intro,intro_img,pages,isbn13,isbn10,bdate,num FROM (SELECT bno,btag,bgenre,cover,btitle,writer,price,sale_price,dis_rate,publisher,intro,intro_img,pages,isbn13,isbn10,bdate,rownum as num FROM (SELECT bno,btag,bgenre,cover,btitle,writer,price,sale_price,dis_rate,publisher,intro,intro_img,pages,isbn13,isbn10,bdate FROM book WHERE ( btitle LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR writer LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR btag LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR bgenre LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR publisher LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%') AND bgenre LIKE '%'||#{genre}||'%' ORDER BY bno ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/20.0) FROM book WHERE bgenre LIKE '%'||#{genre}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book WHERE bgenre LIKE '%'||#{genre}||'%'

SELECT bno,btag,bgenre,cover,btitle,writer,price,sale_price,dis_rate,publisher,intro,intro_img,pages,isbn13,isbn10,TO_CHAR(bdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,num FROM (SELECT bno,btag,bgenre,cover,btitle,writer,price,sale_price,dis_rate,publisher,intro,intro_img,pages,isbn13,isbn10,bdate,TO_CHAR(bdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,rownum as num FROM (SELECT bno,btag,bgenre,cover,btitle,writer,price,sale_price,dis_rate,publisher,intro,intro_img,pages,isbn13,isbn10,bdate FROM book WHERE bdate IS NOT NULL AND intro IS NOT NULL AND cover IS NOT NULL AND intro_img IS NOT NULL AND bdate>=SYSDATE-30 ORDER BY bdate DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / 20.0) FROM book WHERE bdate IS NOT NULL AND intro IS NOT NULL AND cover IS NOT NULL AND intro_img IS NOT NULL AND bdate>=SYSDATE-30

SELECT bno,btag,bgenre,cover,btitle,writer,sale_price,dis_rate,publisher,bdate,num FROM (SELECT bno,btag,bgenre,cover,btitle,writer,sale_price,dis_rate,publisher,bdate,rownum as num FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(book book_bno_pk)*/SELECT bno,btag,bgenre,cover,btitle,writer,sale_price,dis_rate,publisher,bdate FROM book WHERE ( btitle LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR writer LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR btag LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR bgenre LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR publisher LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'))) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT bno, btag, bgenre, cover, btitle, writer, price, sale_price, dis_rate, publisher, intro, intro_img, pages, isbn13, isbn10, TO_CHAR(bdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, num FROM (SELECT bno, btag, bgenre, cover, btitle, writer, price, sale_price, dis_rate, publisher, intro, intro_img, pages, isbn13, isbn10, bdate, rownum as num FROM (SELECT book.bno, book.btag, book.bgenre, book.cover, book.btitle, book.writer, book.price, book.sale_price, book.dis_rate, book.publisher, book.intro, book.intro_img, book.pages, book.isbn13, book.isbn10, book.bdate FROM book JOIN (SELECT tno, SUM(count) as total_count FROM totalcart GROUP BY tno) bb ON book.bno = bb.tno ORDER BY total_count DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / 20.0) FROM (SELECT book.bno FROM book JOIN (SELECT tno, SUM(count) as total_count FROM totalcart GROUP BY tno) bb ON book.bno = bb.tno)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO totalcart (cno, tno, price, id, count, buydate, type) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(cno)+1, 1) FROM totalcart), #{tno}, #{price}, #{id}, #{count}, SYSDATE, #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT b.* FROM book b JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT tno FROM totalcart WHERE id = #{id} AND type = 2) similar ON b.bno = similar.tno WHERE b.bno NOT IN (SELECT tno FROM totalcart WHERE type=2 AND id=#{id}) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 12;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT b.* FROM book b JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT tno FROM totalcart WHERE id != #{id} AND type = 2) similar ON b.bno = similar.tno WHERE b.bno NOT IN (SELECT tno FROM totalcart WHERE type=2 AND id=#{id}) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 12
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM book ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 12
